name: The North Face Chilkat IV Winter Boots - Men's
description: Say "yes" to that winter hike invitation. The Chilkat IV boot is waterproof and insulated for striding through powder and slush. The soles have temperature-sensitive lugs to provide solid footing while trekking along the Escarpment, doing a lap of your favorite snowshoe trail, or while shoveling your driveway.Waterproof leather upper with flexible molded rubber shell.DryVent™ waterproof construction keeps feet dry.200g Heatseeker™ insulation keeps your feet toasty warm.Lace-up closure with gusseted tongue keeps snow out.Dual-density footbed is softer under forefoot and heels for comfort.Compression-moulded EVA midsole cushions impacts.Non-marking TNF Winter Grip® rubber outsole with IcePick® lugs for non-slip traction, grip and stability on snow and ice.
